comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: This photograph appears on page 114 of the following book: Karskens, Grace 1999, Inside The Rocks : the archaeology of a neighbourhood Hale & Iremonger, Sydney Bearing this caption: "Bridget Merchant's Family Grocery at 121 Gloucester STreet. The shadowy, bearded figure stnding on the balcony may be her youngest son, Waler. (C.H. Bertie, 'Gloucester Street Looking South', c1900, SHFA; data courtesy Wayne Johnson)" SHFA is an abbreviation used in the book for Sydney Harbour Foreshores Authority. Trove identifier for the book: trove.nla.gov.au/work/28817147 trove.nla.gov.au/work/28817147

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: This photo was recently determined to be part of the Rocks Resumption photographic survey, the title and date of the image has been changed accordingly Here is a map of the Rocks Resumption area (last one in the sequence) AB
